title: Ionic liquid strategy for chitosan production from chitin and molecular insights
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,1154-1164
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00053F, Paper
Open Access

Van Minh Dinh, Santosh Govind Khokarale, Pedro Ojeda May, Tobias Sparrman, Knut Irgum, Jyri-Pekka Mikkola
Chitosan production from [Emim][OAc] IL-pretreatment of shrimp chitin and subsequent microwave-mediated deacetylation is described. [Emim][OAc] and [TBA][OH] can be recovered. MD simulation of the [TBA][OH]–chitin system is illustrated.
